page.title: 16Social amenities- Ellastone.
page.content: We went to find out about the social activities and amenities available in Ellastone. We asked what sort of organisations people can join. We found they could join WI,Reading room, Entertainment committee, Parish Council or Parochial Church Council. We then asked about evening classes or day classes held in the village hall and were told that occasionally patchwork, crochet and yoga classes had been held. There is a Gala day and cheese and wine garden party held annually. These events are to raise money and for people to enjoy. In July 1985 for the first time a horse show was held in Ellastone, proceeds to the church.
